overview: President Obonjo is a 55 year old dictator of the Lafta Republic who came to UK and has been leading a covert revolution to become the first President to take the UK comedy industry by storm. This show is one milestone on the journey - an impactful story of friendship between an African dictator and an Englishman. With dry deadpan humour and banging punchlines, maybe the revolution is on its way.
title: President Obonjo: Goodbye Mr. President
